title: Fairly heavy showers expected in parts of the island
byline: The Meteorology Department says showers or thundershowers will occur at times in Northern, Eastern, North-central, Uva and Southern provinces and in Matale and Nuwara-Eliya districts.

title: President AKD links Thai Pongal festival’s values to ‘Clean Sri Lanka’ initiative
byline: President Anura Kumara Dissanayake, in his Thai Pongal message, underlined the festival’s deep cultural and spiritual significance, connecting it to Sri Lanka’s broader goals of environmental and societal renewal.

title: PM Harini calls for gratitude to nature in Thai Pongal message
byline: Prime Minister Harini Amarasuriya, in her message for Thai Pongal, emphasized the festival’s significance in fostering appreciation and gratitude, particularly toward nature.

title: Five acting ministers appointed during President’s state visit to China
byline: With President Anura Kumara Dissanayake’s departure from the country for a State Visit to China, at the invitation of Chinese President Xi Jinping, five acting ministers have been appointed to oversee key ministries under the president’s purview.

title: Person arrested with ‘Ice’ and heroin worth Rs. 40M at Korathota
byline: Police have arrested an individual along with a stock of narcotics in the Welihinda area of Korathota, Kaduwela.

title: President Dissanayake leaves for China; Five acting ministers appointed
byline: President Anura Kumara Dissanayake has left for China this evening (13), for a four-day official state visit.

title: Derana CloseUp Music Video Awards 2024 held with grandeur
byline: “Derana CloseUp Music Video Awards 2024”, the only award ceremony celebrating Sri Lanka’s music video industry, was held recently with much glitz and glamour.

title: Top aide of impeached South Korean president pleads for investigators to halt detention efforts
byline: The top aide of impeached President Yoon Suk Yeol pleaded with law enforcement on Tuesday to abandon their efforts to detain him over last month’s martial law imposition, as authorities prepared a second attempt to take him into custody.

title: President Anura Kumara arrives in China
byline: President Anura Kumara Dissanayake, who embarked on a state visit to China at the invitation of Chinese President Xi Jinping, has arrived at Beijing International Airport.

title: Sajith Premadasa emphasizes gratitude and cultural significance in Thai Pongal message
byline: Opposition Leader Sajith Premadasa extended his heartfelt wishes to Tamil communities worldwide on the occasion of Thai Pongal, acknowledging the festival’s deep cultural importance and the universal value of gratitude.

title: TikTok says report of possible sale to Musk ‘pure fiction’
byline: TikTok has called a report that China is considering allowing a sale of the social media company’s US operations to Elon Musk “pure fiction.”
